stories.text:
If so, how has your OCD been lately?

My answer: I've been struggling a lot with OCD recently, particularly after the birth of my first child. On the bright side, I've recently started tweeting about OCD as a coping mechanism and have found that to be quite cathartic.

stories.text:
Is there a cut-down/minimal version of Windows for running on servers with the absolute minimum unneeded process running?

I want to run some Window code with the absolute minimum additional processes consuming compute cycles.

Does such a version of Windows exist?
